name: Roots Rock
description: Consciously and predominantly incorporates elements of its predecessors and original roots such as Country, Blues, Rhythm & Blues, Rock & Roll, and American Folk Music, but also many other American traditions.

children.name: Swamp Rock
children.description: Incorporates influences from the musical styles and traditions of Louisiana.

children.name: Tex-Mex
children.description: Mixes Rock & Roll, Blues, Country, and several types of Hispanic American Music, particularly Tejano Music.
